name: Veritas - Brazilian Maduro - Toro
additionalNotes: The Veritas Brazilian Maduro Toro is a medium bodied premium cigar that received a coveted 93 Rating from Cigar & Spirits Magazine. Its savory dark Brazilian Arapiraca maduro wrapper covers a Dominican Republic Olor binder, and a filler composed of the finest tobacco leaves from Nicaragua, Dominican Republic, Peru, and Colombia. This specially curated five-nation blend offers mouthwatering notes of coffee and chocolate with an underlying creaminess, an exhilarating aroma, and a very sharp burn. Handmade in Nicaragua, the Veritas Brazilian Maduro
